p: As shown in Figure 5, under the three RCP scenarios, the mean annual T max of all the stations in the HRB showed an upward trend with a considerable rise. The highest temperature rise was in the Qilian area, where the T max increased by 1.69 째C under the RCP 8.5 scenario. From the perspective of the entire basin, Table 1 indicated that the T max under the three RCP scenarios increased by 1.23 째C, 1.35 째C, and 1.55 째C, respectively, which was more remarkable than the increase of the mean annual air temperature.
